snippet.title: Armored Core V - PS3 / X360 - Get ready for the mech invasion (E3 2011 Trailer)
snippet.description:
ARMORED CORE V is a new entry that revolutionizes the series with more content than the previous games, a completely new atmosphere, and a robust offline mode. In addition, the online mode has been newly designed to focus on huge team-based battles on a global scale.

Armored Core V will be available on Playstation 3 and Xbox 360 in 2012. For more information, please visit facebook.com/ArmoredCore.
